snippet: Patrick Devillers has been linked to the disgraced Chinese politician Bo Xilai and to Mr. Bo’s wife, Gu Kailai, who has been implicated in the murder of a businessman.
abstract: Patrick Devillers, a French architect who has been linked to the disgraced Chinese politician Bo Xilai and to Bo’s wife, Gu Kailai, who has been implicated in the murder of British businessman Neil Heywood, has agreed to return to China after Cambodia released him from custody at Beijing’s request; he is to cooperate with the Chinese authorities investigating Heywood's death.
lead_paragraph: Patrick Devillers has been linked to the disgraced Chinese politician Bo Xilai and to Mr. Bo’s wife, Gu Kailai, who has been implicated in the murder of a businessman.

headline.seo: French Architect Tied to Murder Case Returning to China
headline.main: Architect Tied to Scandal Is Returning to China
headline.print_headline: Architect Tied To Scandal Is Returning To China
